scripts.test:sqlite: npm run build && ORM_PROTOCOL=sqlite node test/run
scripts.test:mysql: npm run build && ORM_PROTOCOL=mysql node test/run
scripts.test:postgres: npm run build && ORM_PROTOCOL=postgres node test/run
scripts.test:redshift: npm run build && ORM_PROTOCOL=redshift node test/run
scripts.test:docker:mysql: docker compose -f docker-compose.test.yml run --rm -e ORM_PROTOCOL=mysql test-runner bash -c 'npm ci && npm run build && ORM_PROTOCOL=mysql node test/run'
scripts.test:docker:postgres: docker compose -f docker-compose.test.yml run --rm -e ORM_PROTOCOL=postgres test-runner bash -c 'npm ci && npm run build && ORM_PROTOCOL=postgres node test/run'
scripts.test:docker:redshift: docker compose -f docker-compose.test.yml run --rm -e ORM_PROTOCOL=redshift test-runner bash -c 'npm ci && npm run build && ORM_PROTOCOL=redshift node test/run'
